thread.title_full: Oscars 2017 Best-Dressed Celebrities: See the Head-Turning Looks Photos | Vanity Fair

author: Josh Duboff
title: Oscars 2017 Best-Dressed Celebrities: See the Head-Turning Looks Photos | Vanity Fair
text:
Josh Duboff It’s been a long awards season, friends. We are now at a place where we hum along every time “City of Stars” plays. We find ourselves inadvertently slipping into Natalie Portman’s Jackie accent. And we have all made replicas of Nicole Kidman’s green SAG Awards dress for ourselves (oh, that’s just us?). Tonight, though, is the grand finale, the last red carpet of the season, and the most magnificent of them all. So pour yourself a glass of champagne, open a box of chocolate-covered strawberries, and join us as we take a look at the standout looks from the Academy Awards, our choices for the very best dressed celebrities at this year’s ceremony. Read More Start Slideshow RUTH NEGGA IN VALENTINO 
Negga has been a red carpet stand-out all season long—scoring a Vogue cover along the way—and at the Oscars she opted for a somewhat daring red almost Gothic-sque look that we are very much digging. Frazer Harrison Twitter EMMA STONE IN GIVENCHY 
This is the kind of dress you wear when you know you’re going to win an Oscar. Steve Granitz
